title: Divine Lakshmi Temple Haaram - A Golden Legacy
materials: 22K Gold (సువర్ణము) with Hyderabadi Polish. Adorned with high-quality CZ Diamonds
and Emerald (పచ్చ). Meticulously handcrafted with precision.
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a central pendant featuring Goddess Lakshmi, intricately carved in a temple design (దేవాలయ నమూనా). The pendant is framed by peacocks and accented with CZ diamonds. The necklace chain is of intricate floral link design ending in pearl droplets. The gold is finished in a classic antique style (పురాతన శైలి).
colors: Predominantly golden (బంగారు రంగు) with vibrant accents of ruby red
and sparkling white from the CZ diamonds.
occasions: and traditional South Indian celebrations like Muhurtham (ముహూర్తం) and Seemantham (సీమంతం). Also
a statement piece for formal events.
description: This Lakshmi Temple Haaram embodies timeless elegance and cultural significance. The handcrafted design and antique finish provide a unique and treasured heirloom piece (వారసత్వ ఆభరణం). The quality of the gemstones and gold ensures lasting beauty and value. Owning this piece signifies prosperity and blessings.
